decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | Details shall be submitted prior to first installation to demonstrate that any machinery audible outside the premises will be designed to satisfy an acoustic standard not exceeding NR35 Leq, 5mins, for plant which will operate during the period of 2300 - 0700 hrs weekdays and anytime on Saturdays, Sundays and Bank Holidays, NR40 Leq, 1hr for plant which is controlled by time switches only to run during the period 0700-2300hrs Mondays to Fridays, as measured or calculated at 1m from the nearest facade of the nearest affected noise sensitive premises with all machines running together.  Such details as approved shall be implemented prior to first use and retained as first implemented thereafter in accord with manufacturers' specifications.  REASON: To protect the living conditions of nearby occupiers, in accordance with Adopted Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Policy B5, Replacement UDP Policy 4.11.
description: Alteration to front and rear elevations, cable enclosure adjacent to front wall and partial repositioning of compound fence
